text:
@GOPChairwoman @realDonaldTrump Trump called:
1) Coronavirus a “hoax” 
2) ANTI-Racism protestors “terrorists”
3) Confessed Perjurer Mike Flynn a “good man” who “committed no crime” by twice lying to the FBI — under oath

#FBI #BLM #TyphoidTrump
